title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 3. The Principal Order is amended by substituting for Article 2 the
text_raw:
3. The Principal Order is amended by substituting for Article 2 the 

following: 

"2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 

activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

the monitoring and studying of business systems and processes 
and/or manufacturing systems and processes; 

the performance of quantitative analysis of data and metrics 
associated with business systems and processes and/or 
manufacturing systems and processes; 

the performance of qualitative analysis of equipment, software 
and/or other inputs used in business systems and processes and/or 
manufacturing systems and processes; and 

the design, testing, implementation and evaluation of business 
systems and processes and/or manufacturing systems and 
processes, and/or modifications thereof." 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [129] 3 

Given under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 11 February 2021. 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS Chairman 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

Given under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 11 February 2021. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [129]

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order amends the Industrial Training (Process Analytics) Order 2019, 
which defines the activities of the process analytics industry in relation to which 
An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall exercise its functions 
in the creation of statutory apprenticeships.
